mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_answer (answer_content, member_id, question_id) VALUES (#{answerContent}, #{memberId}, #{questionId})
mapper.select: SELECT tbla.id, tbla.answer_content, tbla.status, tbla.member_id, tbla.question_id, tbla.created_date, tbla.updated_date, tblm.member_name, tblm.kakao_profile_url, tblm.member_position, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_answer_reply WHERE answer_id = tbla.id AND status = 1) AS replyCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_answer_like WHERE answer_id = tbla.id AND status = 1) AS likeCnt, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_answer_like WHERE answer_id = tbla.id AND status = 1 AND member_id = 3 ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS memberLiked FROM tbl_answer tbla LEFT JOIN tbl_member tblm ON tbla.member_id = tblm.id WHERE tbla.question_id = #{questionId} AND tbla.status = 1 AND tblm.status = 1 ORDER BY tbla.created_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_answer SET answer_content = #{answerContent}, member_id = #{memberId}, updated_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_answer SET status = 0, member_id = #{memberId}, updated_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
